body_html: Haha understood. For what it's worth I did some pretty rigorous correctness testing for various combinations of dimensions in my offline debugging scripts, but I was trusting the CI for final evaluation since weight norm is a feature that's been around for a while. I'll add some new tests based on my offline debugging.
